mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, member_id as memberId, board_date as boardDate FROM board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_content, member_id, board_date )VALUES( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberId}, #{boardDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, member_id=#{memberId}, board_date =#{boardDate} WHERE board_no =#{boardNo}
